column1: OtherSpeak : Interesting, because something tells me your name is CAPITAINE...
OtherSpeak : I knew it, you're CAPITAINE!
column2: OtherSpeak : Well you should think about changing your name! I’ll still call you CAPITAINE anyway.

column8: Narrator : On the writer’s desk, there is only a piece of paper.

column1: OtherSpeak : Well CAPITAINE, I have a situation here!
OtherSpeak : You see, I’m a writer.
OtherSpeak : I need to finish my novel very soon.
OtherSpeak : Only one last page to write actually, but I don’t have any ink left!
OtherSpeak : Could you find me some, please?
OtherSpeak : Do you have what I asked?
Choice : Sorry, I don’t have any ink.
column2: Choice : I'll see if I can find any for you and bring it back here. (quest)
column4: Choice : Don’t have any ink bottle, sorry.
column5: Choice : If I find a bottle I’ll give it to you. (quest)

column3: OtherSpeak : My saviour, you really found some ink!
column5: OtherSpeak : Many thanks!

column3: OtherSpeak : There’s only one other thing I'm missing.
column5: Leave

column3: OtherSpeak : You wouldn’t have a piece of paper for me now would you?

column4: Choice : If I ever find one, I’ll bring it to you. (quest)
column5: Choice : Here…
column7: Choice : If I find some, I’ll give it to you. (quest)

column5: OtherSpeak : Blimey ! You’re a saint, thanks!
OtherSpeak : At last, I will be able to finish my novel!
OtherSpeak : Tell you what, my good friend.
OtherSpeak : Come see me again in a moment.
OtherSpeak : And if the novel is a success... I’ll happily give you your share of the profit!
OtherSpeak : It wouldn't have been possible without your help, after all.
OtherSpeak : See you around!
Switch=>debut
Leave

column1: OtherSpeak : Ah CAPITAINE, there you are!
OtherSpeak : I have very bad news, unfortunately.
column5: OtherSpeak : Ah, it’s you again...

column1: OtherSpeak : The novel was a flop. Complete disaster. In fact I don't know what to do with all these unsold copies.
column2: OtherSpeak : The novel did ok, I guess...
column3: OtherSpeak : The novel did good around these parts!
column4: OtherSpeak : The novel was an outstanding success, my friend!
column5: OtherSpeak : The novel was an outstanding success.

column1: OtherSpeak : So I don’t have any money to give you, my poor companion.
column2: OtherSpeak : Here, I didn’t earn much from it but this is for you!
column3: OtherSpeak : I’m very happy! Here, your share as promised!
column4: OtherSpeak : I owe you big time! Here, your share!
column5: OtherSpeak : But, I decided not to give you anything in return.

column1: OtherSpeak : But please, at least have a copy of the book!
column5: OtherSpeak : You see, your help was insignificant, and I don’t even need you anymore...

column2: OtherSpeak : Don't forget your copy of the book too!
column3: OtherSpeak : And a copy of the book for you of course!
column4: OtherSpeak : And your copy of the book, let me know what you think, partner!
column5: OtherSpeak : I don’t even have a copy to give you. They’re all gone!
AddToInventory<Roman>/Misc
Node=>suite bénéfices

column1: OtherSpeak : Fare thee well CAPITAINE, thank you.
